AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Issued Position

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_UPPosSecVal

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Org_ParentValidation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @AD_Org_ID@ is not null then Ehcm_Org_V.Ehcm_Org_V_ID not in (select ad_org_id from ad_org where em_ehcm_parent_org =@AD_Org_ID@) else 1=1 end and case when @AD_Org_ID@ is not null then Ehcm_Org_V.Ehcm_Org_V_ID <> @AD_Org_ID@ else 1=1 end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_OrgList_HR (without *)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_ORG_ID <> '0' and AD_ORG_ID in(select ad_org_id from Ehcm_Hrorg_Classfication where Ehcm_Org_Classfication_ID in (select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where classification = 'HR' and isactive ='Y') and isactive ='Y' and ad_client_id =@#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpProm_Pos_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE:
ehcm_positionvalue_v.isactive='Y' and ehcm_positionvalue_v.ehcm_postransactiontype_id not in (select ehcm_postransactiontype_id from ehcm_postransactiontype where value in ('CAPO','TROPO' ))
and ehcm_positionvalue_v.transaction_status='I'
and ehcm_positionvalue_v.department_id=(case when @Transfer_Type@='ID' then @Department_ID@ else @NEW_Department_ID@ end )
and (case when @Decision_Type@='CA' then 1=1 else (ehcm_positionvalue_v_id in ( select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_position where (ehcm_position_id not in (select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_posemp_history where ehcm_position_id is not null and case when ehcm_posemp_history.enddate is not null then ((to_date(to_char(startdate,'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') >= (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@startdate@)) and to_date(to_char(coalesce (enddate,to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')),'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') <= to_date(to_char(coalesce ((select eut_convertto_gregorian(@enddate@)),to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')),'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy')) or (to_date(to_char( coalesce (enddate,to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')) ,'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') >= (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@startdate@)) and to_date(to_char(startdate,'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') <= to_date(to_char(coalesce ((select eut_convertto_gregorian(@enddate@)),to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')),'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy'))) else ehcm_posemp_history.enddate is null end ))) or (ehcm_positionvalue_v_id =@NEW_Ehcm_Position_ID@) or ( @Decision_Type@='UP' and ehcm_positionvalue_v_id in (select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_employment_info where isactive='Y' and status='ACT' and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id=@Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ )) ) end )
and ehcm_positionvalue_v_id in ( select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_position where ehcm_grade_id in ( select ehcm_grade_id from ehcm_grade where seqno >=( select seqno from ehcm_grade where ehcm_grade_id=@Employmentgrade@) and ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@ order by seqno asc limit 3))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_CITY(Current country)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @C_Country_ID@ is not null and @C_Country_ID@ <> '' then C_City.C_Country_ID=@C_Country_ID@ else C_City_ID in (select c_city_id from c_city where ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Emp_Grade Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_grade_id in (select ehcm_grade_id from ehcm_employment_info where ehcm_emp_perinfo_id=@Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_contract_status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.value in ('ISS','UP')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_PositionDeptValidation

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Position
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_position_id in (select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_position where department_id=@Department@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EventGroupTypeProration
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Eventgrouptype ='P'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Delegation_newPosition
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((( Ehcm_Position_v.Ehcm_Position_V_ID in (select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_position where (ehcm_position_id not in (select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_posemp_history where ehcm_posemp_history.enddate is not null and case when ehcm_posemp_history.enddate is not null then ((to_date(to_char(startdate,'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') >= (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@startdate@)) and to_date(to_char(coalesce (enddate,to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')),'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') <= to_date(to_char(coalesce ((select eut_convertto_gregorian(@enddate@)),to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')),'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy')) or (to_date(to_char( coalesce (enddate,to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')) ,'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') >= (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@startdate@)) and to_date(to_char(startdate,'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') <= to_date(to_char(coalesce ((select eut_convertto_gregorian(@enddate@)),to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')),'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy'))) else ehcm_posemp_history.enddate is null end and (case when ehcm_posemp_history.isdelegated='Y' then ehcm_position_id in (select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_position where ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@) else ehcm_position_id not in (select coalesce(ehcm_position_id,'') from ehcm_employment_info where isactive='Y' and status='ACT' and changereason in ('EXSEC','SEC')) end ))))) and Ehcm_Position_v.Department_ID=@NEW_Department_ID@ and ehcm_position_v.ehcm_postransactiontype_id not in (select ehcm_postransactiontype_id from ehcm_postransactiontype where value in ('CAPO','TROPO' ))) or(case when @Decision_Type@<>'CR' then Ehcm_Position_v.Ehcm_Position_V_ID in (select New_Ehcm_Position_ID from Ehcm_Emp_Delegation where isactive='Y' and Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID=@Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ ) and Ehcm_Position_v.Department_ID=@NEW_Department_ID@ else Ehcm_Position_v.Ehcm_Position_V_ID =@NEW_Ehcm_Position_ID@ end )) and Ehcm_Position_v.ehcm_grade_id in (( select ehcm_grade_id from ehcm_grade where seqno >= (select max(seqno) from ehcm_grade where ehcm_grade_id in (select grade.ehcm_grade_id from ehcm_employment_info info join ehcm_grade grade on grade.ehcm_grade_id =info.employmentgrade where info.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id=@Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ and info.isactive='Y' and info.status='ACT' order by info.created desc limit 1)) and ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@ order by seqno asc limit 3))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Loan Transaction type refer
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EHCM_loan_transaction_id not in (select Original_Decision_No from EHCM_loan_transaction where Original_Decision_No is not null ) and loan_type not in ('CA') and decision_status = 'I' and loan_request=@loan_request@ and remamount > 0 and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Employee cet type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EHCM_Deflookups_Type_id IN (SELECT EHCM_Deflookups_Type_id FROM EHCM_Deflookups_Type WHERE reference = 'empcertype' AND Isactive = 'Y') AND Isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpTran_Dep_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id <>'0' and ad_org_id in ( select ad_org_id from ehcm_hrorg_classfication where ehcm_org_classfication_id in ( select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where classification='HR' and isactive='Y' ) and isactive='Y' and ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@ ) and ad_org_id <> (case when @Transfer_Type@='OD' and @Decision_Type@='CR' then (@Department_ID@) else 'null' end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: SectionValidation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id in (select unnest(ehcm_get_all_hrchildren_array(@Department_ID@)::character varying [])) and ad_org_id <> '0' and ad_org_id in(select ad_org_id from Ehcm_Hrorg_Classfication where Ehcm_Org_Classfication_ID in (select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where classification = 'HR' and isactive ='Y') and isactive ='Y' and ad_client_id =@#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_orgtyp_enddte
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: To list org type based on enddate
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Org_Type_ID in (select ehcm_org_type_id from ehcm_org_type where (enddate > now()-1 or enddate is null) and (startdate < now()+1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_DecisionBalanceAbsType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Absence_Type_ID not in ( select Ehcm_Absence_Type_ID from ehcm_payroll_report_config where ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@) and Ehcm_Absence_Type.category='PL' and Ehcm_Absence_Type.isaccrual='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Absence Reason Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Absence_Type_ID in (@Ehcm_Absence_Type_ID@) and enddate is null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Original Decnno validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (EHCM_ticketordertransaction.ehcm_ticketordertransaction_id not in (select a.Original_Decision_No from ehcm_ticketordertransaction a where a.Original_Decision_No is not null ) and decision_type not in ('CA','TP') and EHCM_ticketordertransaction.reason=@Reason@ and EHCM_ticketordertransaction.decision_status = 'PR' and EHCM_ticketordertransaction.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_OrgDept_Location
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Location_ID in (select em_ehcm_location from ad_org where ad_org_id=@Department@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Decision Create and Update
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.Value not IN ('CA', 'CO','EX')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Payment Period in Overtime & BM & ST
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EHCM_Payroll_Definition_id in (select EHCM_Payroll_Definition_id from ehcm_employment_info where ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ limit 1)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Loan Transaction validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EHCM_Payrolldef_Period_id in (select Ehcm_Payrolldef_period_id from Ehcm_Payrolldef_period where (select eut_convertto_gregorian(split_part(@Installment_Start_Date@,'-' ,3 )||split_part(@Installment_Start_Date@,'-' ,2 )||split_part(@Installment_Start_Date@,'-' ,1 ) ) >= ehcm_payrolldef_period.start_date) and (select eut_convertto_gregorian(split_part(@Installment_Start_Date@,'-' ,3 )||split_part(@Installment_Start_Date@,'-' ,2 )||split_part(@Installment_Start_Date@,'-' ,1 ) ) <= ehcm_payrolldef_period.end_date) and EHCM_Payroll_Definition_id IN (select EHCM_Payroll_Definition_id from ehcm_employment_info where ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ limit 1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Grade_Position
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_grade_id in (select gr.ehcm_grade_id from ehcm_grade gr join Ehcm_Position po on gr.ehcm_grade_id = po.ehcm_grade_id where Ehcm_Position_id=@EHCM_Position_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Operator_Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@Item@ not in ('AGE','POS') and value in('EQ','NE')) or (@Item@ in ('AGE','POS') and value in('EQ','NE','LT','LE','GT','GE'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Locationlist
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Location_id in (select ehcm_location_id from ehcm_location where (ehcm_region_id=@EM_Ehcm_Region@) and (enddate > now()-1 or enddate is null) and (startdate < now()+1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_tablename
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_table_id in (select ad_table_id from ad_table where ad_table_id='34CE19C9E51B4E759C9ADC81C9E2DD9F')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Existing bank validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_change_bank_v.value =@Payment_Type@ and ehcm_change_bank_v.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ and enddate is null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Scholarship_Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (ehcm_deflookups_type_id in ( select ehcm_deflookups_type_id from ehcm_deflookups_type where reference ='SCT' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Absence Accrual (Absence Type) Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: isaccrual='Y' and enddate is null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_BusMission_Category
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (ehcm_deflookups_type_id in ( select ehcm_deflookups_type_id from ehcm_deflookups_type where reference ='BMC' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpProm_Point_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_payscalepoint_v_id in (select ehcm_payscalepoint_v_id from ehcm_payscalepoint_v where ehcm_payscalepoint_v_id in( select ehcm_payscaleline_id from ehcm_payscaleline ln left join ehcm_payscale sca on sca.ehcm_payscale_id=ln.ehcm_payscale_id where sca.ehcm_grade_id=@NEW_Grade_ID@) and amount::numeric >= ( select amount from ehcm_payscaleline where ehcm_payscaleline_id=@Ehcm_Payscaleline_ID@) and (select eut_convertto_gregorian(split_part(@Startdate@,'-',3 )||split_part(@Startdate@,'-',2 )||split_part(@Startdate@,'-' ,1 ) ) between startdate and coalesce (enddate,to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')) and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@) order by point::numeric asc limit 1)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Employee List Val(Common)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo.Status='I' and Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo.employment_Status not in ('C','TE','SD') and Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo.isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Hold UnHold Salary Period Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EHCM_Payrolldef_Period_id in (select EHCM_Payrolldef_Period_id from EHCM_Payrolldef_Period where ehcm_payroll_definition_id = (select ehcm_payroll_definition_id from ehcm_employment_info where ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ and ehcm_payroll_definition_id is not null order by startdate desc limit 1) and ((@Request_Type@='HS' and start_date > (select coalesce(max(prd.start_date), to_date('01-01-1000', 'dd-MM-yyyy')) from ehcm_earn_deduct_elm elm join ehcm_earn_deduct_emp emp on emp.ehcm_earn_deduct_emp_id=elm.ehcm_earn_deduct_emp_id join ehcm_earn_deduct_payroll pay on pay.ehcm_earn_deduct_payroll_id=emp.ehcm_earn_deduct_payroll_id join ehcm_payrolldef_period prd on prd.ehcm_payrolldef_period_id=pay.ehcm_payrolldef_period_id join ehcm_elmttype_def elmdef on elmdef.ehcm_elmttype_def_id=elm.ehcm_elmttype_def_id join ehcm_element_catgry elmctg on elmctg.ehcm_element_catgry_id=elmdef.ehcm_element_catgry_id where elmctg.elemttype= '02' and emp.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@)) or (@Request_Type@='UHS' and start_date >= (select prd.start_date from ehcm_holdunhold_salary hu join ehcm_payrolldef_period prd on prd.ehcm_payrolldef_period_id=hu.ehcm_payrolldef_period_id where hu.ehcm_holdunhold_salary_id=@Hold_Reference_ID@))))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Employee self Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_id in( select Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_id from Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo empinfo left join c_bpartner bp on empinfo.Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_id=bp.em_ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_id left join ad_user us on us.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id where bp.em_ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_id is not null and us.ad_user_id=@ad_user_id@ and empinfo.status='I' and empinfo.status not in ('C') and empinfo.isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Business Mission Category Lookup

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Secondment_ElementGrp

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpProm_Sec_val

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Numeric_GlobalValue

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpTransferPosition

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Employee List Val(Absence Decision)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: status ='I' and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id not in ( select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_empstatus where ad_client_id= @AD_Client_ID@) and ehcm_actiontype_id in ( select ehcm_actiontype_id from ehcm_actiontype where value='HE')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Parentref_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Org_ID in (( select org.ad_org_id from ad_org org join ehcm_org_type typ on org.em_ehcm_orgtyp=typ.ehcm_org_type_id where typ.level = (select level from ehcm_org_type where ehcm_org_type_id=@EM_Ehcm_Orgtyp@ and level != 2 )-1 and CASE when @AD_Org_ID@ is null THEN 1=1 ELSE org.ad_org_id<>@AD_Org_ID@ END))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Original dec no validation in ST
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Emp_Scholarship_ID not in (select Original_Decision_No from Ehcm_Emp_Scholarship where Original_Decision_No is not null) and decision_type not in ('CA','SP') and decision_status = 'I' and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ or Ehcm_Emp_Scholarship_ID = @Original_Decision_No@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Loan Request

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_ScholarShipEmp_Val

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_AbsTypePayment_PeriodType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('D')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_OriginalDecisionNoValInAbsDec
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((ehcm_absence_attendance_id not in ( select Original_Decision_No from ehcm_absence_attendance where Original_Decision_No is not null ) and decision_type<>'CA' and decision_status = 'I' and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ and ehcm_absence_type_id=@Ehcm_Absence_Type_ID@ ) or (ehcm_absence_attendance_id = @Original_Decision_No@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Employee cert language
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EHCM_Deflookups_Type_id IN (SELECT EHCM_Deflookups_Type_id FROM EHCM_Deflookups_Type WHERE reference = 'empcerlan' AND Isactive = 'Y') AND Isactive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Absence Type(Absence Decision) Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: enddate is null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_PosSecVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id in (select unnest(ehcm_get_all_hrchildren_array(@Department_ID@)::character varying [])) and ad_org_id <> '0' and ad_org_id in(select ad_org_id from Ehcm_Hrorg_Classfication where Ehcm_Org_Classfication_ID in (select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where classification = 'HR' and isactive ='Y') and isactive ='Y' and ad_client_id =@#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpTran_Sec_val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id <> '0' and ad_org_id in (select unnest(ehcm_get_all_hrchildren_array(@NEW_Department_ID@)::character varying [])) and ad_org_id in (select ad_org_id from ehcm_hrorg_classfication where ehcm_org_classfication_id in (select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where classification='HR' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y' and ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@) and ad_org_id <> (case when @Transfer_Type@='OD' and @Decision_Type@='CR' then (@Section_ID@) else 'null' end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DecisionStatusValForSelf

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Dependents validation

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Element_Name

Ehcm_Position_id not in ( select replace(unnest(string_to_array (ehcm_getpositionlist(@#AD_Client_ID@,(select Ehcm_Position_id from ehcm_poshierarchy_pos where ehcm_poshierarchy_pos_id=@ehcm_poshierarchy_pos_ID@)),',') :: character varying[] ),'''',''))
and ((Ehcm_Position_id not in ( select Ehcm_Position_id from ehcm_poshierarchy_posnode where ehcm_poshierarchy_pos_id in ( select ehcm_poshierarchy_pos_id from ehcm_poshierarchy_pos where Ehcm_Position_Tree_id in (select Ehcm_Position_Tree_id from ehcm_poshierarchy_pos where ehcm_poshierarchy_pos_id =@ehcm_poshierarchy_pos_id@) )) ) or (Ehcm_Position_id= @Ehcm_Position_id@)) and Transaction_Status='I'

case when @Join_Workreason@='SEC' then (Ehcm_Joinleave_Decno_V.created >= ( select max(maxcr.created) from ehcm_employment_info maxcr where maxcr.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id=ehcm_joinleave_decno_v.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id and maxcr.changereason::text in ('SEC','EXSEC','COSEC') group by maxcr.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id) and Ehcm_Joinleave_Decno_V_ID not in ( select original_decision_no from ehcm_join_workrequest ) ) else
Ehcm_Joinleave_Decno_V_ID not in ( select original_decision_no from ehcm_join_workrequest ) end or Ehcm_Joinleave_Decno_V_ID = @original_decision_no@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpTerm_EmpVal

AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @Accrual_Reset_Date@='FS' then AD_Ref_List.value Not IN ('D','M') when @Accrual_Reset_Date@='BGY' or @Accrual_Reset_Date@ ='LO' or @Accrual_Reset_Date@ ='BHY' then AD_Ref_List.value IN ('D','M','OT') else AD_Ref_List.value IN ('D','M') end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Region

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org(With * and WithOut Parent)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_orgtype_id <>'0' or (ad_org_id ='0' and ad_orgtype_id ='0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Units Val

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_columnname
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_column_id in (select ad_column_id from ad_column where ad_table_id=@AD_Table_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Datatype Lookup Reference(HCM)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((@Reference@ = 'CR' AND AD_Ref_List.value='P') OR (@Reference@ = 'EOT' AND AD_Ref_List.value='H'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_PosHierarchy_Pos_PosVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((Ehcm_Position_id not in ( select Ehcm_Position_id from ehcm_poshierarchy_pos where Ehcm_Position_Tree_id=@Ehcm_Position_Tree_id@)) or (Ehcm_Position_id =@Ehcm_Position_id@) ) and Transaction_Status='I'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Employee_Secondment
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo.Status='I' and Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo_ID not in (select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_employment_info where isactive='Y' and status='Active' and sec_change_reason in ('DIN','DOUT')) ) or (Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo.Employment_Status='SE')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ehcm_grade_validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_gradeclass_id in (select ehcm_gradeclass_id from ehcm_gradeclass where isactive = 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Original dec no validation in BM
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EHCM_Emp_BusinessMission_id not in (select Original_Decision_No from EHCM_Emp_BusinessMission where Original_Decision_No is not null ) and decision_type not in ('CA','BP') and decision_status = 'I' and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ or EHCM_Emp_BusinessMission_id = @Original_Decision_No@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpSupervisor_MangVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((ehcm_emp_perinfo_id not in ( select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_emp_supervisor where ehcm_emp_hierarchy_id=@ehcm_emp_hierarchy_id@)) or (ehcm_emp_perinfo_id =@ehcm_emp_perinfo_id@) ) and status='I' and employment_status<>'TE'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Org_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Organization list based on the core Organization type, for which the transaction allowed is yes and organization is ready.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Org_ID in (SELECT o.ad_org_id FROM ad_org o JOIN ad_orgtype ot ON o.ad_orgtype_id=ot.ad_orgtype_id WHERE isready ='Y' AND istransactionsallowed='Y' OR O.ad_org_id='0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpNewPos Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE:
ehcm_positionvalue_v.isactive='Y' and ehcm_positionvalue_v.ehcm_postransactiontype_id not in (select ehcm_postransactiontype_id from ehcm_postransactiontype where value in ('CAPO','TROPO' ))
and ehcm_positionvalue_v.transaction_status='I'
and ehcm_positionvalue_v.department_id=(case when @Transfer_Type@='ID' then @Department_ID@ else @NEW_Department_ID@ end )
and (case when @Decision_Type@='CA' then 1=1 else (ehcm_positionvalue_v_id in ( select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_position where (ehcm_position_id not in (select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_posemp_history where ehcm_posemp_history.enddate is not null and case when ehcm_posemp_history.enddate is not null then ((to_date(to_char(startdate,'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') >= (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@startdate@)) and to_date(to_char(coalesce (enddate,to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')),'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') <= to_date(to_char(coalesce ((select eut_convertto_gregorian(@enddate@)),to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')),'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy')) or (to_date(to_char( coalesce (enddate,to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')) ,'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') >= (select eut_convertto_gregorian(@startdate@)) and to_date(to_char(startdate,'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy') <= to_date(to_char(coalesce ((select eut_convertto_gregorian(@enddate@)),to_date('21-06-2058','dd-MM-yyyy')),'dd-MM-yyyy'),'dd-MM-yyyy'))) else ehcm_posemp_history.enddate is null end ))) or (ehcm_positionvalue_v_id =@NEW_Ehcm_Position_ID@) or ( @Decision_Type@='UP' and ehcm_positionvalue_v_id in (select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_employment_info where isactive='Y' and status='ACT' and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id=@Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ )) ) end )
and ehcm_positionvalue_v_id in ( select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_position where ehcm_grade_id in ( select ehcm_grade_id from ehcm_grade where seqno >=( select seqno from ehcm_grade where ehcm_grade_id=@Employmentgrade@) and ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@ order by seqno asc limit 3))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_BusMiss_CounCat
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (ehcm_deflookups_type_id in ( select ehcm_deflookups_type_id from ehcm_deflookups_type where reference ='BMCC' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_ComptypeCom_Val

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_PosLetterNo Sel
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Status in ('CO')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Extend Service Emp List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Status='I' and isactive='Y' and ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@ and Employment_Status not in ('TE') and (select extract (year from (age(now() ,ehcm_emp_perinfo.dob )))) >= (select coalesce(em_ehcm_maxempage,0) from ad_client where ad_client_id = @#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_SectionValidation_HR
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id in (select unnest(ehcm_get_all_hrchildren_array(@Department_ID@)::character varying [])) and ad_org_id <> '0' and ad_org_id in(select ad_org_id from Ehcm_Hrorg_Classfication where Ehcm_Org_Classfication_ID in (select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where classification = 'HR' and isactive ='Y') and isactive ='Y' and ad_client_id =@#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_employee(Issued)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo.Status='I' and Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo_ID not in (select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_employment_info where isactive='Y' and status='ACT' and changereason in ('EXSEC','SEC'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_JOB_Classification(VALID)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Job_Classification.Isactive='Y' and Ehcm_Job_Classification.Status='CO' and Ehcm_Job_Classification.AD_Org_ID=@AD_Org_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Earning_Allowance_Element
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_elmttype_def.elementclassi = 'ER' and ehcm_elmttype_def.ehcm_element_catgry_id in (select ehcm_element_catgry_id from ehcm_element_catgry where elemttype = '01')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_EmpValuation_EmpVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (( (case when @Department_ID@ is not null then ehcm_emp_perinfo_id in (select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_employment_info info where info.ehcm_position_id in ( select ehcm_position_id from ehcm_position where department_id=@Department_ID@ and isactive='Y' and ad_client_id =@#AD_Client_ID@) AND info.created >= (( SELECT max(maxinfo.created) AS max FROM ehcm_employment_info maxinfo WHERE maxinfo.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = info.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id AND maxinfo.isactive = 'Y')) and info.ad_client_id =@#AD_Client_ID@ and info.isactive='Y' group by ehcm_emp_perinfo_id ) else 1=1 end) and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id not in ( select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_empevaluation_emp where ehcm_emp_evaluation_id=@ehcm_emp_evaluation_id@) ) or (ehcm_emp_perinfo_id=@ehcm_emp_perinfo_id@)) and status='I' and employment_status<>'TE' and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id not in (select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from EHCM_EmpEvaluation_Emp as line join EHCM_Emp_Evaluation as head on line.EHCM_Emp_Evaluation_id=head.EHCM_Emp_Evaluation_id where (select startdate from EHCM_Emp_Evaluation where EHCM_Emp_Evaluation_id=@ehcm_emp_evaluation_id@) between head.startdate AND head.enddate) or ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @ehcm_emp_perinfo_id@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Org dec Num val in bene and allow
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EHCM_Benefit_Allowance_id not in (select Original_Decision_No from EHCM_Benefit_Allowance where Original_Decision_No is not null ) and decision_type not in ('CA','BP') and decision_status = 'I' and ehcm_elmttype_def_id=@Ehcm_Elmttype_Def_ID@ and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_UpPosNewJobCodeVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @EHCM_Update_NewValue@ = (select value from ehcm_postransactiontype trxtyp where trxtyp.ehcm_postransactiontype_id=@Ehcm_Postransactiontype_ID@ and trxtyp.value not in ( 'RCFRPO' ,'RCPO','RCTRPO')) and @NEW_Ehcm_Grade_ID@ is not null then ehcm_jobs.ehcm_grade_id in (@NEW_Ehcm_Grade_ID@) and ehcm_job_classification_id in (select ehcm_job_classification_id from ehcm_jobs where ehcm_jobs_id =@Ehcm_Jobs_ID@ ) and ehcm_jobs.ehcm_jobs_id not in (@Ehcm_Jobs_ID@) else @EHCM_Update_NewValue@ = (select value from ehcm_postransactiontype trxtyp where trxtyp.ehcm_postransactiontype_id=@Ehcm_Postransactiontype_ID@ and trxtyp.value in ('RCFRPO' ,'RCPO','RCTRPO')) and ehcm_jobs.ehcm_grade_id in (@Ehcm_Grade_ID@) and @Ehcm_Grade_ID@ is not null and ehcm_job_classification_id in (select ehcm_job_classification_id from ehcm_jobs where ehcm_jobs_id =@Ehcm_Jobs_ID@ ) and ehcm_jobs.ehcm_jobs_id not in (@Ehcm_Jobs_ID@) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Payment Type validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_pay_pmt_type_method_id in (select value from ehcm_personal_paymethd where ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @ehcm_emp_perinfo_id@ ) and (ehcm_pay_pmt_type_method.isbanktransfer='Y') and ((select count(ehcm_ppm_bankdetail.ehcm_personal_paymethd_id) from ehcm_ppm_bankdetail join ehcm_personal_paymethd on ehcm_ppm_bankdetail.ehcm_personal_paymethd_id=ehcm_personal_paymethd.ehcm_personal_paymethd_id where ehcm_personal_paymethd.value=ehcm_pay_pmt_type_method.ehcm_pay_pmt_type_method_id and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id =@ehcm_emp_perinfo_id@ )>0)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: NewSectionValidation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id<>'0' and ad_org_id in (select unnest(ehcm_get_all_hrchildren_array(@NEW_Department_ID@)::character varying[])) and ad_org_id in (select ad_org_id from ehcm_hrorg_classfication where ehcm_org_classfication_id in (select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where classification='HR' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y' and ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Emp_Pro_Grade_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: case when @Decision_Type@='CA' or @Decision_Type@='UP' then 1=1 else ehcm_grade_id in (select ehcm_grade_id from ehcm_grade where ehcm_grade.isactive='Y' and seqno > (select seqno from ehcm_grade where ehcm_grade_id in ( @Employmentgrade@ )) and ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@ order by seqno asc limit 1) end

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Position_Job Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_grade_id in (select ehcm_grade_id from ehcm_jobs jobs left join ehcm_job_classification clas on clas.ehcm_job_classification_id= jobs.ehcm_job_classification_id where jobs.isactive='Y' and clas.status='CO' )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Jobs_position
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_jobs_id in (select job.ehcm_jobs_id from ehcm_jobs job join ehcm_position posi on posi.ehcm_jobs_id=job.ehcm_jobs_id where posi.ehcm_position_id=@EHCM_Position_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_UPPos_TransType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: value in ('UGPO','UGREPO','UGTRPO','UGRETRPO','UGFRPO','DGPO','DGREPO','DGTRPO','DGRETRPO','DGFRPO','TRPO','RCPO','RCTRPO','RCFRPO','FRPO','HOPO')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_orgclass_enddte
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: To list org classification based on enddate
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Org_Classfication_ID in (select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where (enddate > now()-1 or enddate is null) and (startdate < now()+1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Org Dec No In Disciplinary Action
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_discipline_action_id not in (select Original_Decision_No from ehcm_discipline_action where Original_Decision_No is not null ) and decision_type not in ('CA','BP') and decision_status = 'I' and payroll_processed = 'N' and ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = @Ehcm_Emp_Perinfo_ID@ or ehcm_discipline_action_id = @Original_Decision_No@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Absence_SubType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (ehcm_deflookups_type_id in ( select ehcm_deflookups_type_id from ehcm_deflookups_type where reference ='AS' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_ElementECriteria_Uniquecode
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_ValidCombination.EM_Efin_Uniquecode is not null

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_PayrollMethod
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EHCM_Pay_Pmt_Type_Method_ID=@EHCM_Pay_Pmt_Type_Method_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_NewSection_ID
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_org_id in (select unnest(ehcm_get_all_hrchildren_array(@NEW_Department_ID@)::character varying[])) and ad_org_id<>'0' and ad_org_id in (select ad_org_id from ehcm_hrorg_classfication where ehcm_org_classfication_id in (select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where classification='HR' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y' and ad_client_id=@#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Emp_Suspension_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_emp_perinfo_id in (select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_emp_perinfo where Employment_Status not in ('TE','SE') or Employment_Status='SD' )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Valid_Addressstyle
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Address_Style.Ehcm_Address_Style_ID in (select Ehcm_Address_Style_ID from Ehcm_Address_Style where coalesce(enddate,'2058-06-21') >= (select current_date) and isactive='Y' and ad_client_id=@AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_BusinessMissionEmp_Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: status='I' and isactive='Y' and (employment_status <>'TE' or employment_status is null)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_DecisionOverlap_Subtype
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ehcm_Decision_Subtype_V.type=( select Decision_Type from EHCM_Decision_Overlap where Ehcm_Decision_Overlap_ID=@Ehcm_Decision_Overlap_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BM ticket order
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS(select original_decision_no from ehcm_emp_businessmission where original_decision_no !='')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Absence_Reason
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EUT_Deflookups_Typeln.EUT_Deflookups_Type_ID in (select EUT_Deflookups_Type_ID from EUT_Deflookups_Type where Value=@Value@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Location_with_Region
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (Escm_Location.c_region_id =@EM_Ehcm_C_Region@ and @EM_Ehcm_C_Region@ is not null )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Discipline Reason
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (ehcm_deflookups_type_id in ( select ehcm_deflookups_type_id from ehcm_deflookups_type where reference ='DR' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_GradeClass_Position
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_gradeclass_id in (select grclass.ehcm_gradeclass_id from ehcm_gradeclass grclass join ehcm_grade gr on gr.ehcm_gradeclass_id=grclass.ehcm_gradeclass_id where gr.ehcm_grade_id=@EHCM_Grade_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Location_Region
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (ehcm_location_v.c_region_id =@EM_Ehcm_C_Region@ and @EM_Ehcm_C_Region@ is not null ) and ehcm_location_v.ehcm_location_v_id in ( select escm_location_id from escm_location where isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_UpPos_PosList
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: transaction_status ='I' and Ehcm_Position.Ehcm_Grade_ID in (@Ehcm_Grade_ID@) and Ehcm_Position.isactive='Y' and Ehcm_Position.Employee is null and Ehcm_Position.ehcm_postransactiontype_id in ( select ehcm_postransactiontype_id from ehcm_postransactiontype where value not in ('CAPO','TROPO'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_AD_Org(Legal Accounting)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Ad_Org.Ad_OrgType_ID in ('0','1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_address_field
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (AD_Ref_List.value IN ( select a.code from ( select 'cy' as "code" ,ehcm_address_style_id from ehcm_address_style where country_ck ='Y' union select 'ct' as "code",ehcm_address_style_id from ehcm_address_style where city_ck ='Y' union select 'dt' as "code",ehcm_address_style_id from ehcm_address_style where district_ck ='Y' union select 'st' as "code",ehcm_address_style_id from ehcm_address_style where street_ck ='Y' union select 'ad1' as "code",ehcm_address_style_id from ehcm_address_style where address1_ck ='Y' union select 'ad2' as "code",ehcm_address_style_id from ehcm_address_style where address2_ck ='Y' union select 'pb' as "code",ehcm_address_style_id from ehcm_address_style where postbox_ck ='Y' union select 'pc' as "code",ehcm_address_style_id from ehcm_address_style where postcode_ck ='Y' ) as a where a.ehcm_address_style_id =@ehcm_address_style_id@ ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_Scholarship_Category
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (ehcm_deflookups_type_id in ( select ehcm_deflookups_type_id from ehcm_deflookups_type where reference ='SC' and isactive='Y') and isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Period Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.Value in ('D','M','Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Branch Ref
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Efin_Bank_Branch.Efin_Bank_Branch_id in (select Efin_Bank_Branch_id from Efin_Bank_Branch where Efin_Bank_id = @bank_code@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_PosDept
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_ORG_ID <> '0' and AD_ORG_ID in(select ad_org_id from Ehcm_Hrorg_Classfication where Ehcm_Org_Classfication_ID in (select ehcm_org_classfication_id from ehcm_org_classfication where classification = 'HR' and isactive ='Y') and isactive ='Y' and ad_client_id =@#AD_Client_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Ehcm_Emp_Promotion(Employee)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo.Status='I' and Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo_ID in (select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_employment_info where isactive='Y' and status='ACT' and changereason in ('EXSEC','SEC','COSEC')) ) or (Ehcm_Emp_PerInfo.Employment_Status='AC')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EHCM_SupervisorNode_EmpVal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ehcm_emp_perinfo_id not in ( select replace(unnest(string_to_array (ehcm_getsupervisorlist(@#AD_Client_ID@,(select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from EHCM_Emp_Supervisor where EHCM_Emp_Supervisor_id=@EHCM_Emp_Supervisor_ID@)),',') :: character varying[] ),'''','')) and ((ehcm_emp_perinfo_id not in ( select distinct info.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_employment_info info where info.ehcm_emp_supervisor_id is not null) ) and (ehcm_emp_perinfo_id not in ( select ehcm_emp_perinfo_id from ehcm_emp_supervisornode where ehcm_emp_supervisor_id in ( select ehcm_emp_supervisor_id from ehcm_emp_supervisor where ehcm_emp_hierarchy_id in ( (select ehcm_emp_hierarchy_id from ehcm_emp_supervisor where ehcm_emp_supervisor_id =@ehcm_emp_supervisor_id@)) )) ) or (ehcm_emp_perinfo_id= @ehcm_emp_perinfo_id@)) and status='I' and employment_status<>'TE'
